- Date: Domitian

#### Title {-}

<div class="col2">

 
| ^1^ *ḥnk ỉrp n mw.t[=f]  *
|
| ^1^ Offering wine for [his] mother.

</div>

#### The King {-}

<div class="col2">

| ^2^ *nsw.t-bỉty  *
|  *nb-tȝ.wy  *
| ^3^ *(wtkr(tr))|  *
| ^4^ *(tym(t)y(ns))|  *
|  
| ^2^ King of Upper and Lower Egypt,
| Lord of the Two Lands,
| ^3^ (Autokra(tor))|
| ^4^ (Domi(t)ia(n))|


</div>

#### Menhyt  {-}

<div class="col2">


| ^5^ *Mnḥ.t* ^6^ *nb.t ḫnt-tȝ  *
|
| ^5^ Menhyt, ^6^ Lady of Khent-ta
